user.title: Connect to OpenClaw
user.description: Enter the URL and API key for your OpenClaw gateway.

data_description.base_url: The URL of your OpenClaw gateway (e.g. https://clawd.example.com)
data_description.api_key: Bearer token for the gateway API
data_description.agent_id: Which OpenClaw agent to talk to (default: main)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot reach the gateway. Check the URL and network.

data_description.model_override: Use a specific model instead of the agent default (e.g. openai-codex/gpt-5.3-codex-spark). Leave empty to use the agent's configured model.
data_description.system_prompt: Instructions prepended to every request. Optimized for voice by default.
data_description.timeout: How long to wait for a response before giving up.
data_description.max_history: Number of recent messages to include for context.
